entries.npc_1_1: Want to hear a crazy story? This guy last night in the cantina was telling us where there's this group of people running around moving things with their minds. He says there was this cave filled with crystals where all of them live. Crazy, huh? He even told us where it was, too. Interested in going out there to see if this is real or not?
entries.npc_2_1: It's your time, not mine. Okay, this is where he said the place was. I'll warn you that if you find nothing there, it's your own fault for believing this guy. Good luck.
entries.npc_3_1: That's what I'm saying! I'm not running out there to find out if he's telling the truth or not. Then again, what if he was?
entries.npc_4_1: Okay, here's the full story. He says he's a medic, right? He gets this call from some weird guy who says his brother needs help. The guy goes running out to these caves with the weirdo, finds the brother, then heals him up. While he's doing that, he says everyone around there were doing crazy things like moving stuff and jumping real high. Go figure. Interested in knowing where?
entries.npc_work_1: Did you find the force crystal hunters' encampment?
entries.player_1_1: Sure, I have nothing better to do.
entries.player_2_1: No thanks. It sounds like some tall tale.
entries.player_3_1: How did he say he found out about the place?
entries.player_sorry: I am still looking for the crystal hunters.
entries.waypoint_description_1: According to the story, this cave is filled with people who can do strange things with their mind
